metadata.description: Vibe coding tools that turn new builders into confident AI-first practitioners. Built on the Work Loop methodology.

plugins.name: prd-generator
plugins.description: Structured PRD creation for vibe coders. Asks the right questions before you start building.

plugins.name: work-loop-coach
plugins.description: Embeds the Work Loop methodology (Articulate → Build → Prompt → Execute → Evaluate → Iterate) into your building process.

plugins.name: evaluate-my-build
plugins.description: Systematic evaluation of your build against your original goals. Celebrates wins, identifies gaps, suggests next steps.
